1.content:
You awaken in a daze. Your muscles ache as you lay on what feels like laminated wood. You struggle to sit up before your eyes begin to open and take in your surroundings.

You were in a strange place, with materials you would only expect to see in a home, but all enlarged on a gigantic scale. You had never seen anything like it. You stand up slowly, being wary of what's around you. After carefully scanning the strange environment, you came to the decision that this place was actually a living room and that you were on a coffee table. You estimate yourself to be only an inch tall.

You find a make-up mirror near the edge of the table and decide to look in the mirror. You look at yourself finding nothing apart from your size wrong. You are called,

1) Jamie, 17 year old guy with brown hair and hazel brown eyes. You are a bit chubby, however you are strong and quick minded.

2) Abigail, 21 year old girl with fiery red hair and blue eyes. You are short but slender with a nicely proportioned rack. However you are lacking a bit when it comes to your rear. You are fast and have great endurance. However problem solving skills are a bit tricky for you.

3) Mark, 27 year old guy with black hair and blue eyes. You are slender and witty, however you can be overly confident in situations. Some turning with good results, others with bad results.

4) Sarah, 19 year old girl with ginger hair and green eyes. You have an hour glass figure, while lacking the greatest rack, you do have a good booty to contend with. However you are a bit ditzy but being as popular as you are, you have picked up a few skills to get others to do what you want.

5) Mystery person.

Looking at yourself in the mirror, you failed to notice a large figure walking in and towards the mirror. You are lifted with the mirror by a giant girl with lipstick in her hand. She is looking right into the mirror where she spots your tiny form.

“What... is... this?” She whispered to herself before slowly picking you up to thoroughly study you.

“Are you... a tiny man?” She puts down the mirror before bringing you up to her intimidating eye. “You are! I thought men were sent up to Mars years ago? Even still, they were of normal height.”

“What do you mean, sent to Mars?” You ask her.

She tells you the story of why they were sent away and you tell her about what was happening before you were shrunk.

“I don’t know how to get you back to where ever it is you came from. But I haven’t seen a man for a while, so you are mine.” She told you.

“What are you going to do to me?” You ask.

She pauses to think before speaking again, “Well..”
